name: Lullaby Heist
description: Play as a feline thief  who has to pull off one last job before bedtime. Of course, no prize worth stealing is left unguarded, the cookie jar is protected by the KPD’s (Kitchen Police Department) wind ups division. Jump, dodge and swipe your way through a 2D stealth platformer of your childhood. Avoid security, sneak past the guards, and don’t forget to complete your mission: COOKIES!
